abstract: Anastasia D. Kelly, who was the American International Group’s general counsel during the financial crisis, explained to Fortune why she quit her job over pay restrictions handed down by the government’s pay czar.
snippet: Anastasia D. Kelly, who was the American International Group’s general counsel during the financial crisis, explained to Fortune why she quit her job over pay restrictions handed down by the government’s pay czar.
lead_paragraph: Anastasia D. Kelly, who was general counsel of the American International Group during the financial crisis, explained to Fortune why she quit her job over pay restrictions handed down by the government’s pay czar.

headline.main: A.I.G.’s Ex-Top Lawyer Gives Her Side of Pay Dispute
